item.title: Join Our Fun, Innovative Team as a Creative Editor! - Upwork
item.description:
Our team is looking for a bright, young mind that is willing to work hard. For this role, we have successfully trained someone from no experience, but any experience can be seen as an asset!

About Us:

Hey there! We're a young, dynamic furniture startup, and we’re on the lookout for a Creative Editor who’s super into content creation and branding. If you thrive in a remote work setting and have skills in UGC ad creation, email design, and brand development, come join our crew!

What You Will Do:
  

Ad Creation and Editing:

- Transform raw footage into awesome ads, adding audio voiceovers and video editing.
- Manage and organize raw footage for content creation.
- Learn to use AI tools like Midjourney to create real, lifelike images.
- Follow guidelines and examples to craft fantastic advertisements.

  

Email Campaigns and Design:

- Design and implement email templates for Klaviyo email campaigns.
- Collaborate on creating email campaigns, ads, and social media posts.

  

Web Development and Landing Pages:

- Help create landing pages using an easy drag-and-drop builder tailored to our audience.
- Make small tweaks on pages to help convert visitors into customers.  

Skills We’re Looking For:

- Proficiency in media tools like Adobe Creative Cloud (Photoshop, Premiere Pro), Capcut, ClickUp, and Microsoft Office Suite.
- Excellent attention to detail.
- Open to feedback and love working with a team.
- Proactive and not afraid to ask questions or seek help.

Why Join Us?

Join our remote team and help shape our creative direction. We love innovation, collaboration, and the unique perspectives everyone brings. We’re committed to your growth in a supportive and fun work environment. Please make the subject line/top line of your application your favourite color. We offer unlimited vacation days and work together to make our dreams a reality. Plus, you’ll get to learn cutting-edge design with AI tools.
  

Tools You’ll Use:

- Microsoft Teams & other Microsoft/Google products
- Click Up
- Adobe Creative Cloud
- Capcut
- OneDrive, Google Drive
- Canva
- Shopify

Commitment:

This is a full-time research and execution gig needing 40-60 hours of your attention each week. We do not accept individuals who take part time gigs, freelancing, or other work. We expect you to give 100% of your effort to this role.

How to Apply:

If you’re excited about this opportunity and want to join us, apply with:

- Your name & WhatsApp number
- Email
- Skype ID
- Portfolio
- A few sentences on why you’re a perfect fit
- Desired monthly salary (in PHP) & available hours per week
- Ideal shifts to work in Manila time (morning, mid-day, night)

  

We are looking for motivated, Gen Z individuals who want to build something awesome together! Thanks for reading and good luck. 😊

Hourly Range: $4.00-$10.00

item.description:
Job Description:

Are you a creative graphic designer and video editor with a knack for crafting engaging ad creatives? We are a dynamic paid ads agency looking for a talented individual to join our team and help create compelling Facebook ad static images and edit user-generated content (UGC) videos for our e-commerce clients.

Responsibilities:

Design eye-catching and high-converting static images for Facebook ads.
Edit and cut UGC videos to produce engaging ad content.
Collaborate with our team to understand client needs and brand guidelines.
Optimize ad creatives to improve performance based on analytics and feedback.
Ensure all ad creatives align with Facebook's advertising policies and best practices.
Requirements:

Proven experience in graphic design and video editing, preferably with a focus on social media advertising.
Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro, After Effects) or other relevant design and editing software.
Strong portfolio showcasing previous work on Facebook ad creatives and video edits.
Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.
Knowledge of current design trends and best practices for social media ads.
Experience in e-commerce is a plus.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with A/B testing ad creatives.
Understanding of Facebook Ads Manager and performance metrics.
Familiarity with different video formats and requirements for social media platforms.
What We Offer:

Competitive pay and the opportunity to work on diverse projects.
Flexible working hours and the ability to work remotely.
A supportive team environment with opportunities for growth and learning.
Regular feedback to help you refine your skills and improve your work.

If you’re passionate about creating engaging ad creatives and have a proven track record in graphic design and video editing, we’d love to hear from you! Please submit your application, including:

A brief cover letter explaining why you're a great fit for this role.
Your resume or CV.
A link to your portfolio showcasing your relevant work.

We look forward to seeing your creative talents in action!
